title: That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report IPGPL24-032, dated December 2, 2024, of the Commissioner, Infrastructure, Planning and Growth Management and the City Solicitor as follows: That, respecting an appeal to the Ontario Land Tribunal filed by EcoVue Consulting Services Inc. on behalf of Peterborough Action for Tiny Homes (PATH) regarding 385 Lansdowne Street East (File Number: Z2408), staff be authorized to proceed as outlined in Report IPGPL24-032.

That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report CSSS24-028 dated December 2, 2024 of the Commissioner, Community Services as follows: That, staff be authorized to proceed as outlined in Closed Session Report CSSS24-028 dated December 2, 2024 of the Commissioner, Community Services.
That item Revisions to the Pre-Application Consultation Process, Report IPGPL24-034 approved on Consent.

That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report LSCLK24-019, dated December 2, 2024, of the City Clerk as follows: That the presentation from the YWCA on Intimate Partner Violence be received for information.

That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report LSCLK24-019, dated December 2, 2024, of the City Clerk as follows: That the presentation from the YWCA on Intimate Partner Violence be received for information. That General Committee approve the recommendations outlined in Report IPGPL24-031, dated December 2, 2024, of the Commissioner of Infrastructure, Planning and Growth Management as follows: a) That the report be received for information; b) The presentation from Dillon Consulting be received for information; and c) That Staff be requested to report further to General Committee as the Secondary Plan and Community Planning Permit By-law project advances through the next Phase of the project, including summaries of Round 2 engagement activities.

b) That the Shareholder Report SH2024-002 and the Peterborough Housing Corporation 2023 Annual Report, attached as Appendix A, be approved; c) That the Shareholder Report SH2024-001 and the Peterborough Housing Corporation Audited Financial Statements for 2023 attached as Appendix B, be approved; d) That Shareholder Report SH2024-003 – Appointment of Auditors attached as appendix C, be approved; and e) That the Shareholder Direction be amended to incorporate the board member changes recommended in Report COU24-002, as approved by Council on November 4, 2024. f) That the Mayor and Clerk be authorized to execute documents to effect the amendments to the Shareholder Declaration on terms satisfactory to the Commissioner of Community Services and in forms acceptable to the City Solicitor.

That the presentation be received for information. e) That an Affordable Housing Task Force be created to guide Recommendation 12. That Council approve the recommendations outlined in Report COU24-003, dated December 2, 2024, of Mayor Jeff Leal, as amended, as follows: a) That the report from the Mayor’s Task Force for Housing Creation, attached as Appendix A, be received for information; b) That the seven recommendations provided in Section One be approved and in force effective December 9, 2024; c) That, with respect to the eight recommendations provided in Section Two, staff be directed to report back with options for implementation for Council’s consideration in one report in April 2025; d) That staff report back on the status of all approved recommendations from the Mayor’s Task Force for Housing Creation Report in the fourth quarter of 2025; and, e) That an Affordable Housing Task Force be created to guide Recommendation 12.

That the presentation be received for information. e) That an Affordable Housing Task Force be created to guide Recommendation 12. That Council approve the recommendations outlined in Report COU24-003, dated December 2, 2024, of Mayor Jeff Leal, as amended, as follows: a) That the report from the Mayor’s Task Force for Housing Creation, attached as Appendix A, be received for information; b) That the seven recommendations provided in Section One be approved and in force effective December 9, 2024; c) That, with respect to the eight recommendations provided in Section Two, staff be directed to report back with options for implementation for Council’s consideration in one report in April 2025; d) That staff report back on the status of all approved recommendations from the Mayor’s Task Force for Housing Creation Report in the fourth quarter of 2025; and, e) That an Affordable Housing Task Force be created to guide Recommendation 12. That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report LSCLK24-017, dated December 2, 2024 of the Commissioner of Legislative Services as follows: That Council pass a by-law in the form attached as Appendix A to Report LSCLK24-017 to amend various committee Terms of Reference.

That Council approve the recommendations outlined in Report COU24-003, dated December 2, 2024, of Mayor Jeff Leal, as amended, as follows: a) That the report from the Mayor’s Task Force for Housing Creation, attached as Appendix A, be received for information; b) That the seven recommendations provided in Section One be approved and in force effective December 9, 2024; c) That, with respect to the eight recommendations provided in Section Two, staff be directed to report back with options for implementation for Council’s consideration in one report in April 2025; d) That staff report back on the status of all approved recommendations from the Mayor’s Task Force for Housing Creation Report in the fourth quarter of 2025; and, e) That an Affordable Housing Task Force be created to guide Recommendation 12. That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report LSCLK24-017, dated December 2, 2024 of the Commissioner of Legislative Services as follows: That Council pass a by-law in the form attached as Appendix A to Report LSCLK24-017 to amend various committee Terms of Reference. That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report LSCLK24-018, dated December 2, 2024, of the City Clerk, on behalf of City of Peterborough Holdings Inc as follows: That Ruth Uy and Tareq Zabet be appointed to the COPHI Board for a three-year term commencing January 1, 2025, and expiring December 31, 2027.

That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report IPGPL24-033, dated December 2, 2024 of the Commissioner, Infrastructure, Planning and Growth Management as follows: a) That Report IPGPL24-033 be received for information and, b) That pursuant to secition29(6) of the Ontario Heritage Act, Council consider an objection to its Notice of Intention to Designate 1400 Monaghan Road and that the City of Peterborough withdraws the notice to designate.
